name: MOLE-A-KITTEN
description:
Oh no! Plants that look like cats are out to eat your garden! Don't worry though, you can make sure they don't!

🡠🡡🡣🡢/WASD = move the finger

Z/X/Spacebar = whack

You can use the mouse if you want to. 

A kitplant works a lot like a mole mixed with a venus flytrap. It's just a mindless plant that whenever senses a garden just digs a hole where it is in attampt to eat the garden. Make sure they don't!
